name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D LIVE!!!】3D新衣装お披露目!! ゲストと歌って踊って生誕祭♪♪♪【hololive⧸宝鐘マリン】 [wF_VmniNI2I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Hololive 3rd Generation members performing 'Wonderful Rush' by μ's.
Post-performance break, members catching their breath.
MC section where Marine reveals her new 3D outfit and discusses her 'age'.

subtitles.original: ...もっとつくるんだ
subtitles.english: ...making even more.

subtitles.original: 今を愛してぶつかる
subtitles.english: Loving the now and colliding,

subtitles.original: (ぶつかる)
subtitles.english: (colliding)

subtitles.original: そんな勢いでずっと
subtitles.english: with that kind of momentum,

subtitles.original: 一生懸命なんだよ
subtitles.english: I'm always giving it my all!

subtitles.original: もっと近くで語り合いたいな
subtitles.english: I want to talk more closely with you.

subtitles.original: 頷いた君とどこまで走ろうか
subtitles.english: How far shall we run together?

subtitles.original: (果てまで)
subtitles.english: (To the ends)

subtitles.original: 走ればいいさ (限界知らない)
subtitles.english: We should just keep running. (Knowing no limits)

subtitles.original: これからのWonderful Rush みんな
subtitles.english: From here on, it's a Wonderful Rush. Everyone,

subtitles.original: 幸せになるため
subtitles.english: in order to become happy,

subtitles.original: 新しい世界探しにいこうよ
subtitles.english: let's go search for a new world.

subtitles.original: 迷ったらWonderful Rush 僕は
subtitles.english: If we get lost, Wonderful Rush. I will

subtitles.original: 輝きを信じて
subtitles.english: believe in the radiance.

subtitles.original: 遥か遠くの虹だけど
subtitles.english: Although it's a rainbow far in the distance,

subtitles.original: そうひとつ掴んで
subtitles.english: yes, I'll grab hold of one piece.

subtitles.original: ダン・ダン・ココロ ダン・ダン・アツク
subtitles.english: Dan dan, my heart beats hotter and hotter.

subtitles.original: ユメ・イッパイ・カナエテ・ミセル
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can make all my dreams come true.

subtitles.original: ダン・ダン・ススム ダン・ダン・ハジケル
subtitles.english: Dan dan, I move forward, bursting with energy.

subtitles.original: 人生急に上下左右
subtitles.english: Life is suddenly up, down, left, right.

subtitles.original: 運命的に急展開
subtitles.english: A sudden turn of fate.

subtitles.original: 最低最高最大最新
subtitles.english: Lowest, highest, largest, newest.

subtitles.original: レッツゴー突進スーパー・ジャンプ
subtitles.english: Let's go! Charging forward, Super Jump!

subtitles.original: なんでだろうね不思議だよ
subtitles.english: I wonder why it's so strange.

subtitles.original: 楽しいと感じるこの時は
subtitles.english: This time when I feel so happy,

subtitles.original: 瞬間のようで永遠のようだね
subtitles.english: feels like a fleeting moment, yet also like eternity.

subtitles.original: 一緒に飛ぼうよダン・ダン・ダン
subtitles.english: Let's fly together, dan dan dan!

subtitles.original: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 (そうだ！今が好きで)
subtitles.english: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 (That's right! Loving the now)

subtitles.original: アン・ナンダ・ブツカル・ン・ダ・ソン・ナ
subtitles.english: It was like that, colliding like that,

subtitles.original: イキオイ・ツケテ・バトン・ニ・イッショウケンメイ・ダ
subtitles.english: gaining momentum and giving my all to the baton!

subtitles.original: もっと気持ちを分かり合いたくて
subtitles.english: I want to understand each other's feelings more.

subtitles.original: 隣にいる君いつでも 一緒にいるから一緒がいいね
subtitles.english: Since you're always by my side, it's better to be together.

subtitles.original: 心配いらない (Alright!)
subtitles.english: No need to worry! (Alright!)

subtitles.original: 始まりのWonderful Rush みんな
subtitles.english: It's the beginning of a Wonderful Rush. Everyone

subtitles.original: 好きな場所目指んだ
subtitles.english: set out for their favorite place.

subtitles.original: 巡り合う季節新鮮な景色
subtitles.english: Seasons coming together, fresh landscapes.

subtitles.original: 胸はずむWonderful Rush 僕が
subtitles.english: Heart-throbbing Wonderful Rush. What I'm

subtitles.original: 目指すのは綺麗な 遥か遠くの虹だから
subtitles.english: aiming for is a beautiful rainbow far in the distance,

subtitles.original: さあ出発だよ
subtitles.english: so let's set off!

subtitles.original: Wonderful... (My angel... Dream come true)
subtitles.english: Wonderful... (My angel... Dream come true)

subtitles.original: count 3 2 1 0
subtitles.english: count 3 2 1 0

subtitles.original: ハイハイ・スーパー・ジャンプ
subtitles.english: Hai hai, Super Jump!

subtitles.original: オーイェー・スーパー・ジャンプ
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, Super Jump!

subtitles.original: ラッキー・ワンダー・まだまだ・レッツゴー
subtitles.english: Lucky wonder, we're still going, let's go!

subtitles.original: もっと近くで語り合いたいな
subtitles.english: I want to talk more closely with you.

subtitles.original: 頷いた君とどこまで走ろうか 果てまで走ればいいさ
subtitles.english: How far shall we run together? We should just keep running to the end.

subtitles.original: 限界それなに？ (Alright!)
subtitles.english: Limits? What's that? (Alright!)

subtitles.original: これからのWonderful Rush みんな
subtitles.english: From here on, it's a Wonderful Rush. Everyone

subtitles.original: 幸せになるため 新しい世界探しにいこうよ
subtitles.english: in order to become happy, let's go search for a new world.

subtitles.original: 迷ったらWonderful Rush 僕は
subtitles.english: If we get lost, Wonderful Rush. I will

subtitles.original: 輝きを信じて 遥か遠くの虹だけど
subtitles.english: believe in the radiance. Although it's a rainbow far in the distance,

subtitles.original: 胸はずむWonderful Rush
subtitles.english: Heart-throbbing Wonderful Rush.

subtitles.original: 僕らが目指すのは綺麗な
subtitles.english: What we're aiming for is a beautiful,

subtitles.original: 遥か遠くの虹だから
subtitles.english: rainbow far in the distance,

subtitles.original: さあ出発だよ
subtitles.english: so let's set off!

subtitles.original: ダン・ダン・ココロ ダン・ダン・アツク
subtitles.english: Dan dan, my heart beats hotter and hotter.

subtitles.original: ユメ・イッパイ・カナエテ・ミセル
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can make all my dreams come true.

subtitles.original: ダン・ダン・ススム ダン・ダン・ハジケル 未来をしっかり見て
subtitles.english: Dan dan, I move forward, bursting with energy. Take a good look at the future!

subtitles.original: せーの！マリン、お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: One, two! Marine, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: みんな...ありがとう...
subtitles.english: Everyone... thank you...

subtitles.original: あれ？ちょっと待って。いつものマリンがいない。
subtitles.english: Huh? Wait a second. The usual Marine isn't here.

subtitles.original: え、ほんとだ。あれ、マリンどこ？
subtitles.english: Oh, you're right. Huh, where's Marine?

subtitles.original: お前誰だ？
subtitles.english: Who are you?

subtitles.original: マリンじゃなくね？マリン？
subtitles.english: That's not Marine, right? Marine?

subtitles.original: 君は誰？
subtitles.english: Who are you?

subtitles.original: じゃじゃーん！
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: なんだ？なんかセクシーお姉さん来たぺこだけど。
subtitles.english: What's this? Some kind of sexy lady has arrived-peko.

subtitles.original: そうなんです。誕生日ということで、何歳になったと思う？
subtitles.english: That's right. Since it's my birthday, how old do you think I've become?
That's right, 17 years old. The... 4th round.
A total of 17...

subtitles.original: 待って。17歳4周目×4ってこと？
subtitles.english: Wait. 17 years old, 4th round times 4?

subtitles.original: やばいぞ、それ。
subtitles.english: That's dangerous.

subtitles.original: だから、今回の衣装はちゃんとね、成長したマリンということで。
subtitles.english: So, this outfit is indeed a 'grown-up' Marine.
